overview: Mischa is bored with her marriage. Her husband, Aron, is so preoccupied with his new job that he even stops having sex with her. Mischa now thinks that he is having an affair with Sandra, his secretary. Then Mischa's life changes when she sees Vincent, her former lover. Mischa finds happiness with him but he is so possessive that he insists on continuing the relationship. Then he starts to threaten Mischa's family.
title: Scandal
